item.title: Arduino Ultrasonic Ruler
item.author: fabianmolina@stanford.edu (Fabian Molina)
item.description: Project Description: In this project, I created an ultrasonic ruler using Arduino that measures the distance to an object and displays the result in centimeters on a 16x2 LCD screen. The device utilizes an HC-SR04 ultrasonic sensor to send out sound waves and record the time it takes for them to reflect back.
